name: Galamity
description:
WebGL Build can crash when restarting the level. This does not occur in the Windows Build.

Galamity strikes again! 

Shoot through hoards of enemy ships
in this reimagination of an old classic.

Inspired by the original Galaga from 1981, this is our entry to the Shacknews Game Jam.

Zope - Code / SFX
tfx - Code / Music / SFX
Metric - GFX / Level Design
